main.name: Salvador Camarillo
main.description: Appasionate with new technologies, always in moving and  self learning with no fear to take challenges.
main.bio: I am a software developer,Mechatronic engineer and Maker, currently working with React js-Aws-Amplify with experience in Django-Python, python libraries as sklearn,pandas matplotlib,numpy, AWS cloud Services, serverless and React native , self motivated always in self learning. Maker interested in 3d print in recent pandemic crissis looking to make community and help others.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
